EXTRACT_CONFIRMED: It takes between 2-7 minutes to extract an area from planet.osm,
depending on the size of the area and the system load.
You will be notified by email if your extract is ready for download.
Please follow the instruction in the email to proceed your request.
You can monitor the status of your request on the server status page.
Press the back button to get the same area in a different format, or to request a new area.
EXTRACT_DONATION: <a href='../community.html#donate'>Your support keeps the BBBike extract service on the air!
Please make a donation with PayPal or bank wire transfer.

EXTRACT_USAGE: • Now move the map to your desired location.
• Click and hold the left mouse button, draw the bounding box, release the left mouse button.
EXTRACT_USAGE2: To change the polygone, you have to first click on it and then you can move, resize or extend it.
Please press the extract button after you are done with polygone creation.
EXTRACT_USAGE2_OLD: • Select a Format, enter Your email address and Name of area to extract.
• Click the extract button. Wait for email notification and download the map. Done!
EXTRACT_LIMIT: Too many requests. Please try again later in 15min. Thanks!
If you are a commerical customer, you may try out the extract pro service.
EXTRACT_VALID: The input data is not valid.
Please click on the back button
of your browser and correct the values!
EXTRACT_INTRO_FORMAT: These instructions will show you how to extract OpenStreetMap data in your favourite format.
Please select a format (OSM, PBF, Garmin, Shapefile, mapsforge, OsmAand, SVG, GeoJSON, SQL etc.
EXTRACT_INTRO_EMAIL: The email field is required, you will be notified by email if your extract is ready for download.
EXTRACT_INTRO_NAME: Please use meaningfull name for the extract to find it later.
EXTRACT_INTRO_CLICK: You can then move or resize the box, and then click on the extract button to start the extract job.
EXTRACT_INTRO_SUBMIT: You already choose the area - great! Please click on this extract button to start the extract. Thanks and enjoy!
